General.Name: Southern Hydropower JSC
General.Description: Southern Hydropower Joint Stock Company manufactures, transmits, and distributes electricity in Vietnam. It operates the Da siat hydropower plant with a capacity of 13.5 MW; Da Dang 2 hydropower plant with a capacity of 34 MW; and Da M'bri hydropower plant with a capacity of 75 MW. The company also provides architectural and related consultancy services; installs water supply and drainage equipment, heaters, air conditioners, technology equipment and machines, and electrical systems; and repairs electronic, optical, and electrical equipment. In addition, it offers training services; and trades in equipment, machines, and other mechanical accessories. Southern Hydropower Joint Stock Company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
